form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: EXAMPLE OF STATEMENT USED BY NATURALIZATION APPLICANT'S PHYSICIAN AFFIRMING APPLICANT'S NEED TO TAKE CITIZENSHIP INTERVIEW AND/OR OATH AT HOME, 00A378360

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/3/2023 Alejandro Saichin, M.D. MEDIC Internal Medicine - Cardiology 1419 N. Hacienda Blvd. DEL SOL La Puente, CA 91744 (818) 918-3828 EXAMPLE OF STATEMENT USED BY NATURALIZATION APPLICANT'S PHYSICIAN AFFIRMING APPLICANT'S NEED TO TAKE CITIZENSHIP INTERVIEW AND/OR OATH AT HOME (This statement must be prepared on the physician's letterhead) DATE 09-19-97 To: Supervisory District Adjudications Officer Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street, Room 8010 Los Angeles, California 90012 RE: GOMEZ TRINIDAD 02-17-12 I am the attending physician for the above-named patient, who I understand is currently applying for U.S. citizenship. I am writing to affirm all the following with regard to this patient: I have diagnosed the patient as having (I AMNESIA, SENILITY. SEEBELOW 1. As a result of this condition the patient is unable to (i TO TAKE THE TEST ). Because of these limitations, the patient is unable to participate in (INDICATE THE CITIZENSHIP INTERVIEW AND/OR OATH OF CITIZENSHIP) at the usual location(s), and needs to be permitted to carry out these activities at his/her residence. If you wish to contact me, my telephone number is: Yours truly, A Saichin NAME OF ATTENDING PHYSICIAN STATE LICENSE NO. 00A378360 THIS STATEMENT NEEDS TO ACCOMPANY THE LETTER SENT TO INS BY THE APPLICANT. physical
